t: Clear view? Thank Ettore Steccone - Commercial Zone Products
s: September 23, 2021 - You see, Ettore Steccone, an Italian immigrant who moved to the U.S. shortly after the end of World War I, is the inventor of the modern T-type window squeegee. And the same design he fashioned about 85 years ago is still being used today. Steccone earned his living in America by washing windows.
